algorithm_technique: Iterate through the string, maintaining a counter for the number of vertical bars encountered. Count asterisks only when the counter is even.
problem_summary_simple: Count asterisks that are not between pairs of vertical bars.
problem_summary_technical: A single pass through the string, using a parity counter for vertical bars to determine if an asterisk is within a pair.
key_insights: The problem can be solved by tracking the state of being inside or outside a pair of vertical bars.
A simple counter that toggles between 0 and 1 (or even/odd) is sufficient to manage this state.
Asterisks are only counted when the state indicates they are outside any pair of vertical bars.
